We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.title: Code for Taiwan
IndexPage.subtitle: Building Digital Infrastructure for a Better Society
IndexPage.description: We are a civic tech community dedicated to creating open-source solutions that improve government transparency, civic engagement, and public services.

hero.headline: Technology for Social Good
hero.subheadline: Join us in building a more transparent and participatory democracy through technology

open_source.title: Open Source Projects
open_source.description: We develop and maintain open-source tools that address real civic needs

community.title: Community Building
community.description: We bring together technologists, designers, and citizens to collaborate on civic projects

transparency.title: Government Transparency
transparency.description: We work to make government data more accessible and understandable to citizens

education.title: Civic Education
education.description: We organize workshops and events to promote digital literacy and civic participation

join.title: Join Our Community
join.description: Whether you're a developer, designer, data analyst, or simply a citizen who cares about Taiwan's future, there's a place for you in our community.

LocaleLayout.title: Code for Taiwan - Building Digital Infrastructure for a Better Society
LocaleLayout.description: Code for Taiwan is a civic tech community dedicated to creating open-source solutions that improve government transparency, civic engagement, and public services.

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
